vwr.project.services.graphics
Class DrawService

java.lang.Object
  vwr.project.services.graphics.DrawService

public class DrawService
extends java.lang.Object

allows limited access to various functions in DrawManager

SetCamera

public void SetCamera(float x,
                      float y,
                      float r,
                      float s)
Set the camera parameters.

Parameters:
x - - X position of the camera
y - - Y position of the camera
r - - Rotation of the camera
s - - Scale, or zoom of the camera

DrawSprite

public void DrawSprite(float x,
                       float y,
                       float r,
                       float s,
                       org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture tex,
                       org.newdawn.slick.Color col)
Draws a sprite.

Parameters:
x - - X position of the center of the sprite
y - - Y position of the center of the sprite
r - - Rotation of the sprite
s - - Scale of the sprite
tex - - Texture to use for the sprite
col - - Color tinting of the sprite

DrawUISprite

public void DrawUISprite(float x,
                         float y,
                         float r,
                         float s,
                         org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture tex,
                         org.newdawn.slick.Color col)
Draws a sprite in front of the world, unaffected by the camera.

Parameters:
x - - X position of the center of the sprite
y - - Y position of the center of the sprite
r - - Rotation of the sprite
s - - Scale of the sprite
tex - - Texture to use for the sprite
col - - Color tinting of the sprite

                     org.newdawn.slick.Color c1,
                     float x2,
                     float y2,
                     org.newdawn.slick.Color c2)
Draws a line.

Parameters:
x1 - - X position of the starting point
y1 - - Y position of the starting point
c1 - - Color of the starting point
x2 - - X position of the end point
y2 - - Y position of the end point
c2 - - Color of the end point

y1 - - Y position of the starting point
c1 - - Color of the starting point
x2 - - X position of the end point
y2 - - Y position of the end point
c2 - - Color of the end point

DrawString

public void DrawString(org.newdawn.slick.TrueTypeFont ttf,
                       float x,
                       float y,
                       float size,
                       java.lang.StringBuffer text)
Renders white text unaffected by the camera

Parameters:
ttf - - Font to use.
x - - X position of this text
y - - Y position of this text
size - - Size of this text
text - - StringBuffer that contains the string of this text.

Parameters:
ttf - - Font to use.
x - - X position of this text
y - - Y position of this text
size - - Size of this text
col - - Color of this text
text - - StringBuffer that contains the string of this text.

DrawCursor

public void DrawCursor(float x,
                       float y,
                       float r,
                       float s,
                       org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture tex,
                       org.newdawn.slick.Color col)
Draws the mouse cursor.

Parameters:
x - - X position of the cursor
y - - Y position of the cursor
r - - Rotation of the cursor
s - - Scale of the cursor
tex - - Texture of the cursor
col - - Color tint of the texture of the cursor.
